title: Blood Moon Team?
body:
Patch 6.4 is the when the next 2 Blood Moon skins; Kennan and Yasuo. So when those skins get released, does anyone want to make a blood moon team? I want to create a group of people with blood moon skins and a will to win, but also to have fun at the same time, too. 

I, myself, have BM Kalista and Shen. I just need people in the other roles. A good Akali or Yasuo player for the mid lane. Either I or someone else can play ADC with Kalista, depends on what y'all want. Same goes for Shen. 

List of all the BM skins: 
Zilean
Thresh
Elise
Kalista
Akali
Shen
Yasuo
and Kennen. 

Cya on the Rift!

replies.body: I wish I was good with any of these champions. D: I can sorta play Zilean? xD
are skin type (like blood moon , or arcade, non holiday skin) only added once a year? basically im asking can more blood moon skins come out this year or not ?
It's not set in stone to be once a year. You saw Blood Moon Elise and Thresh in early 2015, followed by Blood Moon Zilean later in 2015.
sweet can still hold out hope for bm malz

I know that feel.
Sigh... 

Hoping for a Blood Moon Mordekaiser TwT
Katey, maybe discuss with the team for a new lissandra skin? I would love to see one.
I have Blood Moon Akali, and I can play things semi-well. :^)
RIP no Blood Moon Morde skin :(

I main Yasuo, so I'd be up for hitting Summoner's Rift in as stylishly as possible.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
That's a pretty good team comp. Just the right mix of ad and ap and if Elise goes tank, it'll have a pretty decent front line.
Too bad I'm in EUW xD Would have joined gladly since I'll instabuy Yasuo.
I have all of em, and will totally have the next two, so I could join in :D

> [{quoted}](name=Hybrid Cub,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=GlB2RcA0,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-09T20:45:54.973+0000)
>
> 
> List of all the BM skins: 
> Zilean
> Thresh
> Elise
> Kalista
> Akali
> Shen
> Yasuo
> and Kennen. 
> 
> Cya on the Rift!

I would join you, but while I own 400+ skins, I don't own any of these and don't plan on acquiring them (unless forced on me through some random event).  Best of luck with the team!
